VEvil.​Core.​FE.​AFrontEndModule
MonoBehaviour
public abstract
VEvil.​Core.​FE.​AFrontEndModule
VEvil.​FE.​Gameplay.​HUD.​HeadsUpDisplay

AFrontEndModule is designed to be placed on GameObjects next to a UnityEngine.Canvas component.

get;
private 
set
}

public Canvas Canvas {
get;
private

The UnityEngine.Canvas component of this AFrontEndModule.

get;

}
Functions
Awake
private void Awake()
OnDestroy
private void OnDestroy()

private void Start()

private void OnEnable()

Update
private void Update()
FixedUpdate
private void FixedUpdate()
LateUpdate
private void LateUpdate()
DefineInputSettings
private protected abstract FrontEndModuleInputSettings DefineInputSettings()

Define the FrontEndModuleInputSettings this AFrontEndModule will use.

OnAwakeModule
private protected virtual void OnAwakeModule()

OnAwakeModule is called when an enabled script instance is being loaded.

OnStartModule
private protected virtual void OnStartModule()

OnStartModule is called on the frame when a script is enabled just before any of the Update methods are called for the first frame.

OnEnableModule
private protected virtual void OnEnableModule()

OnEnableModule is called when the object becomes enabled and active.

OnDisableModule
private protected virtual void OnDisableModule()

OnDisableModule is called when the behaviour becomes disabled.

OnDestroyModule
private protected virtual void OnDestroyModule()

Destroying the attached Behaviour will result in the game or Scene receiving OnDestroy.

OnUpdateModule
private protected virtual void OnUpdateModule()

OnUpdateModule is called every frames.

OnFixedUpdateModule
private protected virtual void OnFixedUpdateModule()

Frame-rate independent MonoBehaviour.FixedUpdate message for physics calculations.

OnLateUpdateModule
private protected virtual void OnLateUpdateModule()

OnLateUpdateModule is called every frame, if the Behaviour is enabled.

OnModuleShowed
public virtual void OnModuleShowed()

OnModuleShowed is called when this AFrontEndModule is showed.

OnModuleHidden
public virtual void OnModuleHidden()

OnModuleShowed is called when this AFrontEndModule is no longer showed.
